title: Twisted-Wonderland: Glorious Masquerade PV

synonyms: Glorious Masquerade: Crimson Flowers and the Bell of Salvation
alternative_titles.en: The Glorious Masquerade: Let the Bell of Solace Ring Trailer
alternative_titles.ja: 「ツイステ」アニメーションPV_期間限定イベント「グロリアス・マスカレード」

synopsis:
Students of Night Raven College are invited to a gathering of prospective mages being held at Noble Bell College, in the distant City of Flowers. Clothed in borrowed finery, the visiting delegates anticipate the glorious masquerade that will mark the climax of the cultural exchange. Meanwhile, the bell that is the college's namesake rings relentlessly.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
